name: SUMO BATTLE (GabuGames)
description:
You are a SUMO BALL, who is trapped on top of a FLOATING ISLAND. There is no way to get down, and your only goal is to not be knocked off! There will be enemies which spawn and try to kill you, and it will just get harder as the waves increase. 

GOOD LUCK!

Movement: W & S (Forwards and backwards) A & D (Move camera)

Enemies:  White enemy (eazy to kill, doesn't know you back) - Checkered enemy (Hard to kill without powerup, knocks you back)
